"""
 This script allows to create a new Discussion Thread.
 """
 MARKER = ['', None, []]
 
 portal = context.getPortalObject()
 person = portal.ERP5Site_getAuthenticatedMemberPersonValue()
 
 version = '001'
 language = portal.Localizer.get_selected_language()
 user_assignment_dict = portal.ERP5Site_getPersonAssignmentDict()
 if group_list in MARKER:
 group_list = user_assignment_dict['group_list']
 if site_list in MARKER:
 site_list = user_assignment_dict['site_list']
 discussion_thread = portal.discussion_thread_module.newContent(
 portal_type = "Discussion Thread",
 title = title,
 source_value = person,
 version = version,
 language = language,
 description=description,
 subject_list=subject_list,
 classification=classification,
 group_list=group_list,
 site_list=site_list,
 reference=reference)
 discussion_post = discussion_thread.newContent(
 portal_type = "Discussion Post",
 title = title,
 text_content = text_content,
 source_value = person,
 version = version,
 language = language)
 
 # depending on security model Thread and Post can be directly published or shared
 portal_status_message = "New discussion created. Your post will be reviewed for approval."
 discussion_thread.submit()
 discussion_post.submit()
 
 if send_notification_text not in ('', None):
 # we can send notifications
 email_list = []
 notification_list = send_notification_text.split('\n')
 for notification in notification_list:
 # XXX: proper email validation?
 if '@' in notification and '.' in notification:
 # user specified an email
 email_list.append(notification)
 else:
 # we can assume user wanted to specify Person's title
 person_list = portal.portal_catalog(portal_type='Person',
 title=notification)
 email_list.extend([x.getDefaultEmailText() for x in person_list])
 email_from = portal.email_from_address
 email_subject = "New forum post"
 email_template = """
 
 New forum post has been created at this url:
 
 ${url}""" 
 email_body = context.Base_translateString(email_template, mapping={'url':discussion_thread.absolute_url()})
 email_list = filter(lambda x: x not in (None , '',) and '@' in x, email_list)
 # XXX: use activities & portal_notifications
 for email_to in email_list:
 context.MailHost.send(email_body, email_to, email_from, email_subject)
 
 return discussion_thread.Base_redirect(form_id,
 keep_items = dict(portal_status_message=context.Base_translateString(portal_status_message)))
title, text_content, form_id=\'view\', predecessor=None, description=None, subject_list=None, classification=None, group_list=None, site_list=None, send_notification_text=None, reference=None,**kw
